oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Yellow Fever Hospital Tent
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sketches; yellow fever; disease; medicine; nurses; camps; 1870s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "A Tent Scene at Camp Joe Williams." One of seven illustrations on the cover of Frank Leslie's Illustrated Newspaper on September 21, 1878.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Illustrations from Harper's Weekly Newspaper and Frank Leslie's Illustrated Newspaper
